 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Administrative Contact: 
 
I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site at 
http://ssbiz.org/Flirtin-with-disaster.html that contains a trademark 
violation for my client, Water, inc, a company based in Carson, 
California, USA. Water, inc. is the owner of the Everhot ®, Evercold®, 
Everbrew®, Enviropure®, Navinet® and Water, inc ® trademarks and 
associated domain names. I have attempted to remove this infraction by 
delivering two notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record 
however the domain owner refuses to remove the infraction.  
 
The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer 
confusion by using Water, inc.'s trademarks to divert web traffic away 
from Water, inc's website at www.waterinc.com. This action constitutes 
trademark infringement and unfair competition. I am therefore asking for 
your assistance in having the domain owner remove all references to 
Water, inc.'s trademarks from their site. I truly appreciate your 
co-operation in this matter and hope to hear from you at your earliest 
convenience.  
 
Sincerely, 
 
 
Trademark Department 
Water, inc. 
Legal Administrator <administrator-106@legal-notification.com> 
[IFID:2H8J75]
